title: March of the Penguins (Episode 50!)
description:
Tig and Cheryl celebrate their 50th episode of True Story with the Morgan Freeman-narrated Antarctic extravaganza "March of the Penguins"! In addition to reading up on the nitty gritty of penguin anatomy, our doc duo picks some of their favorite films from the past year and reminisces about the podcast to date. Many more episodes to come-- thanks for listening to True Story! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
